short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and highlight Jira issue status changes effortlessly, enhancing your workflow and providing valuable insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of losing track of status changes buried in Jira issue histories? Say goodbye to the hassle with our Jira Status Tracker extension!

Our extension seamlessly extracts and highlights all status changes in Jira issues, making them beautifully visible. No more digging through endless history changes. Plus, it provides valuable insights into the time your issues spend in various statuses.

Transform your Jira experience and modernize your workflow with Jira Status Beautify. Get started today and stay on top of your issue statuses effortlessly!
